Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the New York city school construction authority to award certain contracts for goods or services to minority- or women-owned businesses without a competitive bidding process
Summary: Authorizes the New York city school construction authority to award certain contracts for goods or services to minority- or women-owned businesses without a competitive bidding process.
LawCode: Amd ยง1734, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the New York City school construction authority to award certain contracts to minority or women-owned businesses without a competitive bidding process
